DOC.brief_summary: This open-label study evaluate safety , pharmacokinetics efficacy 12 24 week regimen ombitasvir/paritaprevir/ritonavir dasabuvir without ribavirin HCV-genotype 1-infected subject Estimated Glomerular Filtration Rate ( eGFR ) < 30 , include hemodialysis peritoneal dialysis .
DOC.brief_title: Ombitasvir/ABT-450/Ritonavir Dasabuvir With Without Ribavirin HCV Genotype 1-Infected Adults With Chronic Kidney Disease
DOC.criteria: 1 . Positive antiHCV Ab ( Antibody ) HCV RNA > 1,000 IU/mL Screening . 2 . Screening laboratory result indicate HCV genotype 1 infection . 3 . Subject never receive antiviral treatment hepatitis C infection ( treatmentnaive subject ) subject receive previous treatment peginterferon without RBV nonresponse ( HCV RNA quantifiable end treatment relapsed end treatment ) . 4 . Estimated Glomerular Filtration Rate ( eGFR ) < 30 mL/min/1.73 m^2 estimate Modification Diet Renal Disease ( MDRD ) method . 1 . Women pregnant breastfeeding . 2 . Positive test result Hepatitis B surface antigen ( HBsAg ) antiHuman Immunodeficiency Virus ( HIV Ab ) . 3 . Any current past clinical evidence ChildPugh B C classification clinical history liver decompensation ascites ( noted physical exam ) , variceal bleeding , hepatic encephalopathy .
